document_data.name: Maresa Rost
document_data.mainbody: '''Maresa Rost''' was a tall [[air genasi]]-[[human]]-crossbreed in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Maresa had very pale skin, large violet eyes, a pointed chin, and a heart-shaped face. She moved gracefully, and she had long silver-white hair. Maresa wore the star-shaped pendant given to her mother by [[Araevin Teshurr]] after she left the [[Company of the White Star]].
document_data.Relatives: Maresa's mother was [[Theleda Rost]]. When Theleda was murdered, Maresa hunted down her assassin and killed him, then killed the assassin's employer.
document_data.Equipment: Maresa wore a suit of dark crimson [[studded leather armor]] and carried a [[rapier]] and a [[crossbow]].
